DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine what the different outcomes are for biceps tenodesis and tenotomy in the treatment of the long head of the biceps pathology.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Outcomes Between Biceps Tenotomy and Tenodesis in the Treatment of the Long Head of the Biceps Pathology
DOC.criteria: patient with chronic refractive bicipital pain
